IUCN Red List (Species Assessed for Global Conservation)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#GeneralDescription
dataObjects.title: Biology
dataObjects.description: Generally found in small rainforest creeks (Ref.2847).  An omnivorous egg layer and a peaceful community fish which prefers the following aquarium conditions:  pH=7.1, H=8, 27°C water temperature, vegetative cover (Ref. 6398).

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Distribution
dataObjects.description: Oceania:  known only from a few sites in the upper Fly River system near Kiunga, Papua New Guinea.
dataObjects.references: Allen, G.R. 1991 Field guide to the freshwater fishes of New Guinea. Publication, no. 9. 268 p. Christensen Research Institute, Madang, Papua New Guinea. (Ref. 2847)

dataObjects.subject: http://rs.tdwg.org/ontology/voc/SPMInfoItems#Morphology
dataObjects.description: Dorsal spines (total): 6 - 8; Dorsal soft rays (total): 10 - 12;  Analspines: 1; Analsoft rays: 16 - 19
